name: AWS Access Key ID
recommendation: Use AWS IAM roles, AWS Secrets Manager, or environment variables

name: AWS Secret Access Key
recommendation: Use AWS IAM roles, AWS Secrets Manager, or environment variables

name: GitHub Personal Access Token
recommendation: Use GitHub Apps, environment variables, or GitHub Secrets

name: GitHub OAuth Token
recommendation: Use GitHub Apps or environment variables

name: GitHub App Token
recommendation: Regenerate token and use environment variables

name: Google API Key
recommendation: Use Google Cloud Secret Manager or restrict API key scope

name: Google OAuth Access Token
recommendation: Tokens expire but should not be hardcoded

name: Slack Token
recommendation: Use Slack App configuration or environment variables

name: Slack Webhook URL
recommendation: Use environment variables to store webhook URLs

name: Stripe Secret Key
recommendation: Use environment variables and Stripe's restricted keys

name: Stripe Publishable Key
recommendation: While publishable, should be managed through environment variables

name: Twilio Account SID
recommendation: Use environment variables for Twilio credentials

name: Twilio Auth Token
recommendation: Use environment variables and rotate regularly

name: JWT Token
recommendation: Store JWT tokens securely, set appropriate expiration, and validate properly

name: RSA Private Key
pattern: -----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY-----[\s\S]*?-----END RSA PRIVATE KEY-----
recommendation: Use secure key management systems like AWS KMS, HashiCorp Vault, or Azure Key Vault

name: OpenSSH Private Key
pattern: -----BEGIN OPENSSH PRIVATE KEY-----[\s\S]*?-----END OPENSSH PRIVATE KEY-----
recommendation: Use secure key management and never commit private keys

name: EC Private Key
pattern: -----BEGIN EC PRIVATE KEY-----[\s\S]*?-----END EC PRIVATE KEY-----
recommendation: Use secure key management systems

name: Hardcoded Password
recommendation: Use environment variables, configuration files, or secure vaults

name: MySQL Connection String
recommendation: Use environment variables or secure configuration management

name: PostgreSQL Connection String
recommendation: Use environment variables or secure configuration management

name: MongoDB Connection String
recommendation: Use environment variables and MongoDB Atlas connection string management

name: Redis Connection String
recommendation: Use environment variables for Redis credentials

name: FTP Credentials
recommendation: Use SFTP instead and store credentials securely

name: Email Credentials
recommendation: Use app passwords or OAuth for email authentication

name: Discord Bot Token
recommendation: Regenerate token and use environment variables

name: Telegram Bot Token
recommendation: Use environment variables and regenerate if compromised
